DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomize control trial propose intervention immediate post-partum period educate woman contraceptive option , particularly long act reversible contraception ( LARC ) method aim increase amount woman choose LARC method .
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible participant identify post-partum period randomize one two group . The control group receive standard care contraceptive counseling include prenatal counseling receive well information nurse practitioner round post-partum period . The intervention group also receive standard care contraceptive counseling also watch 10 minute video create CHOICE project counsel different contraceptive option . Both group fill pre-intervention questionnaire well post-intervention questionnaire 24hrs later . The primary outcome type contraception woman choose . The secondary outcome include determine woman come post-partum visit well get method contraception choose post-partum floor .
DOC.criteria: Women give birth University Hospitals Case Medical Center Patient Women 's Health Center Women deliver one child Women receive contraceptive counseling nurse practitioner care postpartum unit Severe neonatal complication time delivery ( neonatal death , neonatal admission neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) except case chorioamnionitis ) Severe maternal complication time delivery ( patient require intensive care unit care , patient require hysterectomy time delivery ) Preterm delivery < 34 week
